title: Action Girlz Racing [USA] [Wii] [English]
description:
Pick your favorite Action Girl and take to the roads to race around fairy-tale castles, holiday resorts and even through school corridors while the teachers aren&#039;t looking! Best of all are the Action Girlz themselves:

Meet Kat, an action girl with no fear ÃƒÂ¢?? she will take anything on! She loves to hug the curves of every race track as close as she can, and is always the first to have a drink after the racing is over Latisha is so cool you have to check her for a pulse ÃƒÂ¢?? nothing riles this girl! She knows her own mind and no one changes it ÃƒÂ¢?? watch out for her, sheÃƒÂ¢??ll have no qualms about overtaking at speed. Bianca is all about being a professional ÃƒÂ¢?? she has it all! She uses her head and thinks about every corner and pick-up on the track. But she isnÃƒÂ¢??t all brains though, Bianca knows how to have fun & relax with her mates once the race is finished. Amber may come across like sheÃƒÂ¢??s more concerned about her looks but thatÃƒÂ¢??s only because she wants to win in style! Her image is important to her, but nothing compares to the feeling of winning. Akiko likes indie music and tap-dancing, hey every girl&#039;s different! But when it comes to racing she only thinks about the finish line, and will do whatever it takes to cross it first. Blossom harnesses flower-power like no other female ÃƒÂ¢?? sheÃƒÂ¢??s really something, and her passionate yet relaxed personality makes her the ideal driver - all the other girls love her. Courtney is up there with Latisha for being the coolest chick around ÃƒÂ¢?? but sheÃƒÂ¢??s not copying man, oh no, sheÃƒÂ¢??s got her own style. When she overtakes her competitors on the track, she knows she&#039;ll be seeing them L8er.
